message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I think you'll really love it, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny. I'm willing to start at a price of $9,500.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. While I'm interested, $9,500 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $9,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
